title: Game Accepted and Freezes.. Now I have Queue Dodge Punishment..
body:
I just wanted to play some ARUF so I queue up and it is fine. Then suddenly I see the accept game option I click accept. Then like 20 seconds later all I see is that it said I dodged multiple games and now I have a 15 minute queue dodger punishment. Please help I want to play URF!!

EDIT: I also have black screen error and it all started today..

replies.body:
happening to me after someone else dodges too. i spend 5 mins just waiting on a game, then someone dodges in champ select. then the client freezes when i try and hit accept and it says I missed the queue. ALWAYS happens after a dodge. 100% of the time. Never the first time I queue.

WTF is going on please.

If this is happening only in the Beta Client, then this is the emerging issue with the Beta Client that we're looking into. You may be able to workaround this by collapsing your friends list groups **prior** to queueing up for a match, as shown below:

(Click to enlarge)
https://imgur.com/a/GJulP

Please let me know if this worked!
